full_text:
Lynn & JoJo
1. I sent Lucian & Rushia's mail to their correct address and called Post office to make sure all future mail will be sent to them.
2. I scheduled the cable company to come on Thursday. This is their soonest appointment. Ghislaine asked me to make an appointment because the TV in the Blue Room does not get a clear reception.
3. Shutter company will come early Thursday to measure shutter next to Ghislaine's desk. The shutter will not roll down.
* Both cable company & shutter company will call me on my cell phone to make sure Jeffrey & Ghislaine are not here.
Jeffrey E. Epstein
# 301-3101
Nicole
DOJ-OGR-00032520

text_blocks.content:
1. I sent Lucian & Rushia's mail to their correct address and called Post office to make sure all future mail will be sent to them.
2. I scheduled the cable company to come on Thursday. This is their soonest appointment. Ghislaine asked me to make an appointment because the TV in the Blue Room does not get a clear reception.
3. Shutter company will come early Thursday to measure shutter next to Ghislaine's desk. The shutter will not roll down.
* Both cable company & shutter company will call me on my cell phone to make sure Jeffrey & Ghislaine are not here.

additional_notes: The document appears to be a handwritten note with three main points regarding tasks completed or to be completed. The note is addressed to Lynn & JoJo and signed off with a reference number. The handwriting is generally legible, but there are some minor inconsistencies in formatting and spelling.
